dialogues.text: It's not without effort.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can see that. Off Bella's look, Edward explains --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One touch and Aro can see every                       thought I've ever had in my life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're quite the telepath yourself, Edward. Though... you can't read Bella's thoughts. Fascinating. He releases Edward's hand and turns to Bella.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would love to see if you are an                     exception to my gifts, as well.                       He reaches for Bella's hand. She hesitates, does she have choice? Aro laughs at her reluctance, further extends his hand. Bella finally takes it. A beat as he holds her hand... confusion sweeping over hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Interesting. He releases her, moves back to his chair, deep in thought

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wonder if --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reading Aro's thoughts)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see if she's immune to all our                    powers, shall we Jane?                                  Jane turns toward Bella but Edward springs in front of he Jane instead focuses her gaze on Edward which FLINGS him across the room where he collapses, writhing in agony. Ja concentrates on him with a small smile, enjoying his pain

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop! Bella and Alice rush to his side.    As soon as Jane look away, Edward's pain ceases.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jane, dear.    The girl?                                Jane's gaze now turns toward Bella who cringes, awaiting pain... but nothing happens. Jane's grin is replaced by anger. Aro laughs like a child with a new toy. Jane, infuriated, moves toward Bella, but Aro stops her w a tiny gesture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remarkable! She confounds us all.      So what do we do with you now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (seemingly bored)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You already know what you'll do, Aro.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She knows too much; she's a liability.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's true. Unless Edward intends to give her immortality... (looks at Edward)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But that's not your intention, is it. Shame. He nods to Felix who moves toward Bella, but he only take step before Edward tackles him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Edward, don't!                                       Alice leaps to help but several Volturi guard hold her ba which is no easy job. As she struggles mightily -- Edward is David to Felix's Goliath.    Edward will lose, he'll go down fighting. -- Edward is fast, anticipating Felix's moves before he makes them, but Felix is stronger -- -- Felix grabs Edward, throws him into the ceiling, SMASH against the marble; he drops like a stone. Is then immediately KICKED across the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Aro)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop this! Please!                                   But Aro ignores her, leans forward to study Edward.    Ja itching to step in. Aro gestures her back. -- Felix takes some hits, but then lifts Edward overhead, CRACKING him like a nut, then flinging him against a wall Bella runs toward Aro but a Volturi Guard flings her away she flies HARD against the wall. The guard is then occupied by the thrashing Alice -- Bella, bruised, but not broken, makes another attempt to to Aro -- finally reaches him, kneels in front of him --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it!    Kill me! Just leave them alone! -- as she yanks her collar back, exposing her neck to him Aro is surprised and intrigued. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enough.                                              Felix immediately releases Edward who manages to look up. He sees Bella kneeling in front of Aro.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get away from her -- ! Edward moves toward Aro but is quickly immediately pinned Jane's invisible powers; he writhes in agony. Alice can n longer bear Edward's suffering --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Edward, stop. I've already seen it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (through gritted teeth)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice, stay out of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know what to do.                                   Aro, intrigued, gestures for Jane to stop; Edward goes li

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah yes, the clairvoyant. I saw your gift in Edward's thoughts. What is it                you've seen?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm the one who will change Bella.                   Bella is taken aback by this.   Aro is surprised, as well

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beat, then gestures)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please. Be my guest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not here. Her father is in law                       enforcement. If she goes missing,                    there will be questions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is easily dealt with.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It will happen, Aro.   See for                       yourself. She thrusts out her hand. Aro nods to the Guards who release her. She gives him her hand. He closes his eyes -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Edward hunts a deer. Matching his pace is another vampire Bella! She's pale and beautiful - she and Edward smile at each other as they take a last grand leap for the kill --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK ON ARO, utterly delighted.   He releases Alice's han

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mesmerizing! To see the things you've seen, that haven't happened yet!                       Alice moves to Edward's side, helps him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Bella)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your gifts will make for an intriguing immortal. Go make your preparations.                   Bella hurries to Edward's side, too.    Caius is put out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're letting them leave?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dear Caius, the girl's disappearance                   will be conspicuous at best. And                       surely you see her potential.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (dispassionately)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let us be done with this.    Heidi will                arrive any moment.                                     Aro gestures - Demetri throws open the carved double door Caius glares at them threateningly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We will make sure she follows through.                 I would not delay. We do not offer                     second chances.                                        Edward, recovered now, takes Bella by the arm and, with Alice, they cautiously back toward the door --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Demetri leads Bella, Edward and Alice out of the hall. As they make their way up the corridor, they see coming toward them -- A GROUP OF TWO DOZEN TOURISTS, led by a beautiful vampire HEIDI. Edward, Alice and Bella stop to let them all pass. As Heidi passes Demetri, he gives her a flirtatious smile

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice fishing, Heidi, save some for me.               Heidi smiles.   She gives Bella a curious once-over, then continues on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the group)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This way, please. Stay together... A HUSBAND and WIFE, 60's, cameras around their necks, pas Bella. The Husband winks at Bella --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unusual tour, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill, get a picture of that bust there. As the Tourists file past, we HEAR a variety of languages German, Japanese, English. The group is moved toward the carved double doors which swing open for them. They file into the marble hall -- Edward pulls Bella forward, but she cranes her neck back the last of the tourists disappear inside. As the large doors close... we begin to HEAR SCREAMING -- Edward and Alice rush Bella out - PUSH IN ON BELLA'S TORMENTED FACE as the SCREAMING gets louder... and louder

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON BELLA'S SLEEPING FACE as the SCREAMING CRESCENDOS -- Bella sits bolt upright, yelling --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Stop!                                             She catches her breath, disoriented, confused. Then she turns to find Edward lying beside her, looking at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It... wasn't a dream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go back to sleep. You've been through                a lot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, you might --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be here when you wake up.                      Beat, she looks at him, wary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?   Out of guilt?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (realizing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You... think I asked the Volturi to                 kill me because I felt guilty?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I went to them because I thought I'd                lost you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't even want me.                            Now Edward takes her by the shoulders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bella. The only reason I left was to                protect you. I wanted you to have a                 chance at a normal, happy life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it was so easy for you to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had to be convincing. But easy?     In            my hundred years, I've never had a                  harder time than what I just went                   through.                                            She's beginning to believe him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I kept seeing you. Visions of you.                  Always protecting me. I thought I was               going crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your own instincts were speaking to                 you. I wish it had been me. But                     you're the heroic one. You saved me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He moves to kiss her... but abruptly stops.   Suddenly -- HER DOOR swings open - she spins toward it as the LIGHTS flip on and Charlie enters. Edward is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You alright? Another nightmare?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm okay.    You don't have to worry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Last time you said that, you                           disappeared. You want to talk                          nightmares?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sincere)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm really sorry, Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just... don't ever do that to me                       again. Okay?                                           (off her nod)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you're grounded for the rest of                    your life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get some rest so I can keep lecturing                  you in the morning.                                    He kisses her forehead. Exits.     A beat... she turns to Edward sitting on the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He won't forgive me easily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you? I don't deserve it but... I                  hope you will. Because I honestly                      have no idea how to live without you.                  Bella melts in his eyes.   He kisses her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You won't be able to get rid of me                     once Alice changes me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She won't have to. There are ways to                 keep the Volturi in the dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pulling away)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll come after your whole family. You'd risk that just to keep me human?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just? You really don't understand what you'd be giving up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I really do. They look at each other; an impasse.    She decides somet grabs her jeans, pulls them on--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not the only one with a say in it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You all know what Edward wants. And you know what I want. But I won't force myself on you... INCLUDE THE ENTIRE CULLEN FAMILY who surround Bella. The house has been restored to it's original warmth and beaut Edward sits off to the side as Bella addresses them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think the only fair way to handle                  this is by vote --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't be serious --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (firmly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is my meeting, Edward. Edward, frustrated, sits back.    She faces the family ag

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: However this turns out, I'm not                      letting the Volturi hurt you. I'll go                back to Italy alone --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hell you will.   I'm not missing another fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not up for a vote, Emmett.    I don't want you involved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've always been involved, honey, and we're not going to stop --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, please -- I want you to seriously think about this. If I join you, you'll be stuck with me for a long time - forever. It's a huge decision. And I want - I need your honesty here. They nod or otherwise communicate agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then let's take a vote... Alice? Alice jumps up and hugs Bella.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like you're not already my sister.     Of course, yes! Bella smiles.   Jasper rises, but keeps his distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I vote yes. It'll be a relief not to want to kill you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um.   Thanks? Okay, Rosalie? Rosalie, torn, looks at Edward who's stony toward her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Edward, I'm sorry for what I did. I really am. And I know you're not ready to forgive me... (to Bella)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But this isn't the life I'd have chosen for myself. I wish there'd been someone to vote no for me... (she exchanges a glance with Carlisle - then...)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bella takes it stoically.    Emmett bounds over and lifts Bella into a bear hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I vote hell yeah. We can pick a fight with these Volturi some other way. Esme approaches and embraces Bella warmly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I already think of you as part of the family. Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, Esme. Carlisle moves, not to Bella, but to --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Edward --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't go along with this, Carlisle, you know what it means.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've chosen not to live without her, which leaves me no choice. I won't lose my son. (turns to Bella)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Alice has never turned anyone. It'd be safer if I did it -- The front door suddenly SLAMS. Edward's gone.     Bella blanches but turns to the family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.    Thank you all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POV FROM AFAR ON A HILLTOP -- REVEAL IT'S VICTORIA watchi the house down below. Off her seething fury --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FERRARI has pulled over to the side of the road. VICTOR PEERS IN THE WINDOW. The DRIVER, a middle-aged man smiles

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where you headed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seattle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a slow grin)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds perfect.                                       As she climbs in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Edward drives Bella home.    He is somber.   She is resig

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After graduation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just two months.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'll be best for Dad that way. I can                 pretend to be at college somewhere.                   Carlisle suggested it. But...                         (quiet, emotional)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wish you'd be the one to change me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would you be willing to trade for that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hopeful)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Name it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five more years as a human.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Volturi won't wait that long.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll settle for three.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sadly, shakes her head)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won't risk it. It'll have to be Carlisle. He takes her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you so willing to give up your soul?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because I don't believe you've lost yours. And I want to share mine with you forever. He looks to her, kisses her hand... then suddenly Edward SLAMS on the brakes --

dialogues.speaker: THE ROAD
dialogues.text: -- Someone stands in the road directly in front of them - it's JACOB. He glares, then turns and walks into the wood

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is he doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wants to talk to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, he can talk to me first. She pushes out of the car --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Edward and Bella tramp through the woods to FIND -- Jacob leaning against a tree. His expression is hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're still alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been calling you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Couldn't drop by?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He thinks I'm keeping you away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (spinning on him)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay the hell out of my head!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad grounded me, Jake. We're trying                   to get back before he wakes up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacob doesn't buy it. Bella is frustrated. But Edward takes a step toward Jacob. Calm. Diplomatic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacob, I know you have something to say to me, but I'd like to say something first. Alright? Jacob leans back against the tree, arms folded, waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sincere)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. For keeping Bella alive when I... didn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, you didn't. And it wasn't for your benefit, trust me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. I'm still grateful. (then)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I'm back now. And I'm not leaving Bella's side till she orders me away. She looks at him. He returns the look. Jacob sees the devotion between them. It wounds him. But he masks it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Either way, we'll handle Victoria from here on out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's been laying low. Ever since your freaky sister showed up. Guess she can't stand you Cullens either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She'll come back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She does, she's ours.   She killed on our turf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My turn to talk. I'm here to remind you about a key point in the Treaty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reads his thoughts, nods)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I haven't forgotten.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?   What key point?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If any of them bites a human, the truce is over. That's bite, not kill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (realizing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But... if I choose it, it's none of your business. Jacob is horrified, starting to shake with rage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you... what!? No.      No way.   I won't let you --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Bella, step back --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not gonna be one of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not your call --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (even more intense)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what we'll do to you - I won't have a choice --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're done here -- Edward takes Bella's arm, starts to pull her away.    Jac lunges, trying to extract Bella from him --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't speak for her! Edward PUSHES Jacob away; he flies back ten feet in the a but mid-air he PHASES INTO A WOLF!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- The Jacob-wolf lands on all fours, spinning to face Edward in an attack stance. Edward shifts stance, as well readying for a fight --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop! Edward and Jacob circle one another, seconds from lunging

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Bella)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out of here. Now! But Bella races between them, forceful, insistent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to both of them)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You do this, you'll be going through me. A long tense beat, none of them backing down - it could g either way --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I swear to God, I'm not moving. Both rivals see she's dead serious. Edward backs off, eve so-slightly... the Jacob-wolf does the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (turning to Edward)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me a second. Please. Edward shakes his head.   Doesn't move an inch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Read his thoughts.   Is he going to                 hurt me? Edward does, and finally, reluctantly backs away. But his eyes never leave the wolf's. They glare at one another. Bella carefully approaches the Jacob-wolf, blocking his l of sight. Her voice is kind, pleading.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacob, I love you. You're my best friend. But... I can't change how I feel. Please don't make me choose. (quietly, emotionally)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because it'll be him. It's always been him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anguish sweeps through the wolf's fierce face.    It's ev harder to take than when he's in human form --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you know how important you are to -- Suddenly, the wolf BOLTS out of there... ON BELLA - fighting tears as she watches him disappear...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There were problems ahead.     Seemingly              insurmountable...                                     Edward's arms wrap around her from behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... If I didn't become a vampire, the Volturi would kill me. If I did, my best friend would do the job himself, or get killed in the attempt. She turns to face Edward, looking into his loving eyes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victoria was still on the loose, putting everyone I loved in danger... He kisses her tenderly, washing away her concerns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I'd already survived the worst -- losing Edward. So I knew I could survive anything...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm here.   Always. And she sees that's the truth, believes it. He takes her hand and together they turn, heading out of the woods...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And soon, I'd be like him. We'd face our fate together. Forever. Off them, hand in hand, inseparable... as we begin to --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... HEAR the agonized HOWL of a wolf in the far distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
